home_title_seo: Glitch Text Generator - Create Zalgo & Glitchy Text (Copy & Paste)
home_description_seo: Free online glitch text generator. Create scary, cursed, and cool glitchy text effects instantly. Perfect for Discord, Roblox, and more. Copy and paste easily.
home_content: Glitch text generators create eerie, distorted text effects that work across social media, gaming platforms, and messaging apps. But how do they work? The answer lies in Unicode, the universal character encoding standard that contains over 149,000 characters beyond basic letters and numbers.
feature_instant_desc: Generate glitch text in real-time as you type
feature_copy_desc: Copy generated text to clipboard instantly
feature_styles_desc: Choose from Zalgo, cursed, cool fonts and more
step_1_desc: Type or paste your text in the input box above
step_2_desc: Select from Zalgo, glitch, cursed, hacker or others
step_3_desc: If you chose zalgo, you can control the intensity level
step_4_desc: click copy button and paste anywhere you like
faq_what_answer: Glitch text uses Unicode combining characters to create distorted, creepy text effects. Also known as Zalgo text or cursed text.
faq_how_answer: Glitch text is created by adding Unicode combining diacritical marks above, below, and through regular characters.
faq_safe_answer: Yes! Glitch text uses standard Unicode characters that are supported by most platforms and applications.
faq_platforms_answer: Works on Discord, Roblox, Minecraft, social media, messaging apps, and anywhere that supports Unicode.
